text: The following is a list of Iranian actors in alphabetical order. == A == * Ebrahim Abadi (1934-2019) * Hasan Abbasi (1966-) * Akbar Abdi (1958-) * Sajad Afsharian * Dan Ahdoot (1978-) * Jonathan
